about_the_game:
Bauer is a side-scrolling endless runner fun little game where you help a simple mouse fly his plane and avoid all the obstacles in the air. The Demo only allows you to play in one game mode but don't worry, you will have loads of fun! The full game will have 3 game modes, so 3 times more fun! And all will be for free! Forever.



Bauer's dream, ever since he was a child, was to become the first mouse to fly a plane. After working on his own plane for a long time he is finally ready to test it. But he will need your help to avoid all the traffic in the air! It is busy up there. Learn how to use the special skills, see how far you can go and try to get the highest score. Oh and have fun!

Special Features:

  • Entirely hand drawn
  • Family friendly
  • Replayable
  • Multiple Game Modes - only available in the full game

  • Processor: Intel(R) Core i7-7700HQ CPU @ 2.81 Ghz
